industryApplications.title: RAG Industry Applications
industryApplications.subtitle: Real-world applications of Retrieval-Augmented Generation technology across industries

websiteAI.title: Website Intelligence
websiteAI.description: Transform entire websites with AI capabilities, enabling intelligent content recommendations, personalized user experiences, and automated content management.
features: Personalized article recommendations based on user behavior and preferences
Automated content categorization and intelligent tag generation
Visitor intent recognition and content matching
Dynamic content optimization and A/B testing

smartSearch.title: AI-Powered Semantic Search
smartSearch.description: Go beyond keyword matching with semantic search that understands user intent and provides more accurate results.
features: Natural language query understanding and semantic matching
Multi-language search and cross-language content discovery
Automatic synonym and related concept expansion
Intelligent result ranking with relevance scoring

aiQA.title: Content-Based AI Q&A
aiQA.description: Build intelligent question-answering systems using existing website content to provide accurate, timely responses.
features: Real-time Q&A based on website article content
Multi-turn conversations with context understanding
Answer source tracking and credibility assessment
User question analysis and content gap identification

contentManagement.title: Content Management Optimization
contentManagement.description: Automate content processing, analysis, and optimization to improve content quality and management efficiency.
features: Content duplication detection and deduplication suggestions
SEO optimization recommendations and keyword analysis
Content quality assessment and improvement suggestions
Automated content tagging and category management

userExperience.title: User Experience Enhancement
userExperience.description: Leverage AI technology to improve overall user experience and engagement on websites.
features: Smart navigation and content discovery
Personalized reading recommendations and related articles
User interest analysis and behavior prediction
Adaptive interface and content presentation

workingPrinciples.title: RAG Working Principles
workingPrinciples.subtitle: Detailed explanation of Retrieval-Augmented Generation technology
workingPrinciples.overview: RAG is an AI technique that combines retrieval and generation, enhancing large language model capabilities by retrieving relevant information from knowledge bases to ensure accurate and timely output.

step1.title: 1. Content Vectorization
step1.description: Convert website articles and documents into high-dimensional vector representations that capture semantic information.
step1.details: Advanced embedding models transform text into numerical vectors, where each vector contains the semantic features of the document, enabling subsequent similarity calculations.

step2.title: 2. Query Understanding
step2.description: Transform user natural language queries into vectors to understand their true intent.
step2.details: Process user queries through the same embedding model to generate query vectors, preparing for subsequent similarity matching.

step3.title: 3. Similarity Retrieval
step3.description: Quickly find the most similar content segments to the query in the vector database.
step3.details: Use vector similarity algorithms (like cosine similarity) to efficiently retrieve the most relevant documents from large-scale vector databases, typically completing in milliseconds.

step4.title: 4. Context Enhancement
step4.description: Use retrieved relevant content as context to enhance AI model generation capabilities.
step4.details: Provide retrieved documents as additional contextual information to large language models, enabling them to generate responses based on the latest and most relevant information.

step5.title: 5. Intelligent Generation
step5.description: Generate accurate, relevant responses based on retrieved content and user queries.
step5.details: Large language models combine query intent with retrieved context to generate responses that are both accurate and meet user needs while maintaining information traceability.

advantages.title: RAG Technology Advantages
items: Real-time: Generate answers based on latest content without retraining models
Accuracy: Reduce AI hallucination, provide fact-based reliable answers
Explainability: Traceable answer sources, enhancing user trust
Cost-effective: No need for large-scale model training, reducing deployment costs
Domain adaptation: Quickly adapt to specific domains and new knowledge

visualization.title: Vector Visualization
visualization.clickPointToSeeDetails: Click on a point in the visualization to see details
visualization.clickNodeToSeeDetails: Click on a node in the network to see details
visualization.qualityImprovementSuggestion: Consider reprocessing some vectors or adjusting embedding model parameters.
visualization.vectorNormSuggestion: Vector norms are outside normal range, which may affect similarity calculation accuracy.
visualization.vectorQualityGood: Vector norms are within normal range, indicating good embedding quality.
